note: Joined here recently and still trying to figure out how it all works. Trainee curmudgeon. Legal background but stepped back from that now. Wasn't particularly political until fairly recently. I follow current affairs avidly. Brexit was a bad thing. Not quite sure about Independence though but willing to listen and be persuaded. Curry lover. Football fan. DIYer (never finish anything).
